sentence:
• Monster Beverage Corporation's MNST shares slumped 14.4% after reporting fourth quarter adjusted earnings of $0.35 per share, missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate by a couple of cents
• Shares of Best Buy Co., Inc. BBY rose 3% after posting fiscal fourth quarter adjusted earnings of $2.42 per share, outpacing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $2.05
• Sotheby's BID shares jumped 10% after reporting fourth quarter adjusted earnings of $1.47 per share, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.40
• Shares of Salesforce.com, inc. CRM increased 2.7% after posting fiscal fourth quarter non-GAAP earnings of $0.35 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate by a couple of cents
